article: Ole Bull was a very famous violinist from Norway . He really liked to play the violin . But his father thought that playing the violin was not useful . So his father sent him to university to study . However , playing the violin was his dream . He did n ' t want to give up his dream . So he left university before he finished his studies and spent all his time and energy practicing the violin . Unfortunately , his violin teacher was not very good . So when it was time for him to start his concert tour , he still could n ' t play the violin very well . He went to the newspaper office and found the critic . Instead of being angry , he talked about his mistakes with the man and listened to the man ' s advice . After he met the critic , he gave up the rest of his concerts . Then he went back to practice the violin with the help of good teachers . In the end , he got great success when he was only 26 .
